Metadata: Proceedings: Third International Symposium of Abalone Biology, Fisheries, and Culture

Journal of Shellfish Research (Special Issue), 17(3):589-904, December 1998; Proceedings of the Third International Symposium on Abalone Biology, Fisheries, and Culture, October 25-31, 1997, Monterey, California

The scientific papers presented here reflect recent issues and investigations surrounding abalone and its decline in natural habitats. Management, exploitation, pathogens, and environmental changes are discussed. Other topics include aquaculture, feeding, rotation diets, water quality, digestion and metabolism, reproduction, growth, microsatellites​, and thermal tolerance.

The following papers are included in this proceedings: 1. Current status of abalone aquaculture in the Californias. Susan C. McBride pp. 593-600. 2.
